RecipesBase.name: pumkin soup
steps: Cut the pumpkin. Cut the skin off and scrape seeds out. Cut into chunks.

Place the pumpkin, onion, garlic, broth and water in a pot â€” liquid won't quite cover all the pumpkin. Bring to a boil, uncovered, then reduce heat and let simmer rapidly until pumpkinis tender (check with butter knife).
Remove from heat and use a stick blender to blend until smooth.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, stir through cream (never boil soup after adding soup, cream will split).
